pullRequest.title: NMS-12654: Update remote-poller model to link service to locations instead of individual RPs
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12654

This PR includes the model changes and the deletion of the OnmsLocationManager and all of its classes for the RP removal. This branch will compile but of course some tests will fail, since it's too much effort to keep the tests green at this stage.

nodes.bodyText: The constant can be removed, too.

nodes.bodyText: As the sub-class is removed, the liquibase update should ensure that all values with this type are removed from the monitoringsystems table, too.

nodes.bodyText: As this needs revisiting in future, should we mark this with a TODO?
Get rid of the definitionName.  createResource is used just here and can be adopted easily.
